Sneakers in Leather & House Check Cotton.text: These chic and contemporary sneakers from Burberry are the perfect pair to complete your casual edits. The low-top silhouette is defined with panels of House Check cotton and calf leather, and finished with an embossed logo on the heel. For off-duty days, style with a sweater and jeans.

Sneakers in Leather and House Check Cott.text: These chic and contemporary sneakers from Burberry are the perfect pair to complete your casual edits. The low-top silhouette is defined with panels of House Check cotton and calf leather upper and finished with an embossed logo on the heel. For off-duty days, style with a sweater and jeans.

Salmond Check Top Sneakers in Grainy Lea.text: Burberry melds signature details with a sporty-casual silhouette for the new Salmond sneakers. A perfect complement to your off-duty edits, the low-top silhouette is crafted from grained leather with fabric side panels in the house's signature checked pattern.

Axburton Low-top Sneakers in Quilted Lea.text: Burberry's Axburton sneakers deliver a refined take on modern streetwear styling. The low-top silhouette is crafted from leather with linear quilting referencing the house's iconic check motif and set on a sculptural rubber sole for a strong contemporary look.

Sneakers in Check Cotton Canvas.text: Step into the world of high-end fashion with these iconic Burberry sneakers. Crafted from Burberry check cotton canvas, these sneakers exude an air of timeless elegance. The lace-up closure ensures a secure and personalised fit, while the raised Burberry lettering at the heel adds a touch of sophistication. With a cotton and leather lining, these sneakers provide exceptional comfort and breathability

Sneakers in Vintage Check & Leather.text: Step into a world where tradition meets contemporary allure, and let your feet make a statement that transcends time. Expertly crafted in Italy, these sneakers embody the perfect blend of heritage and modernity. The organic cotton upper features the iconic archival vintage check. Smooth leather accents elevate the design, showcasing exquisite craftsmanship and attention to detail.

Jack Low 19 Sneakers in Denim.text: Burberry's Jack sneakers will be a stylish complement to your weekend edits. They are designed in cotton denim for a casual look and are made instantly recognisable with a logo print on the side and embossed branding on the chunky sole.

Kenzoschool Boke Flower Slip-on Sneakers.text: An iconic sneaker that evokes the designer's Japanese heritage with a signature boke flower that decorates the upper proudly. Crafted from canvas, the slip-on silhouette are topped with elasticated sides which make them easy to put on and slide off,.

Kenzoschool High-top Sneakers in Canvas.text: Kenzo's high-top sneakers reference retro-skate culture. Crafted in Thailand, the sneakers are set on a graphic rubber sole and have a canvas upper with BOKE FLOWER embroidery and a military-inspired tag engraved with the address of Kenzo's Paris headquarters.

Kenzo Hoops Sneakers in Leather.text: Kenzo's Hoops sneakers bring retro basketball style to the street. Designed in Paris, the sneakers are set on a chunky rubber sole and topped with smooth leather uppers with perforations and a metal tab at the toe.

Kenzoschool Laceless Sneakers in Coated.text: Kenzo's slip-on sneakers are decorated with a labels motif, which first appeared in a runway show in the 1980s. Printed on the canvas upper, the artwork adds a colourful vintage touch, while the graphic rubber sole and cotton lining ensure comfort.

Kenzoschool Low Top Sneakers in Canvas.text: Kenzo's low-top sneakers reference retro-skate culture. Crafted in Thailand, the sneakers are set on a graphic rubber sole and have a canvas upper with BOKE FLOWER embroidery and a military-inspired tag engraved with the address of Kenzo's Paris headquarters.

Kenzoswing Low-top Sneakers in Leather.text: The perforations in the smooth leather of the Kenzoswing sneakers creates a K that sits alongside a shimmering logo. Set on a chunky sole that's surprisingly lightweight, the round toe silhouette is fitted with flat laces and finished with a contrasting heel tab.

Logo Low-top Sneakers in Leather.text: Kenzo's sneakers showcase the designer logo in classic and contemporary ways. The low-top sneaker has been crafted from premium leather that features a stamp and perforations to deliver designer cool to these kicks.
